title: nijadhaasa varadhaa
sahitya:
nijadAsa varadAkhila jagadAnanda 



(nija)







anupallavi







bhujagAdhipa shayana bhUmijAramaNa



aja purandarAdi vinuta sukhyAta 



(nija)







caraNam







kaushika yAkAri tATaka samhAraNa gautama sati cApa mEgha



samIraNza



Isha kODaNa khaNDana turINa ina vamshaja shrI venkatEshvara



(nija)
